Welcome to our Privacy Policy

Your privacy is critically important to us.

Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours is located at:
Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours
Rangely
81648 - Colorado , US
9706753033

It is Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website. This Privacy Policy applies to https://guidedrockarttours.com/ (hereinafter, "us", "we", or "https://guidedrockarttours.com/"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting personally identifiable information you may provide us through the Website. We have adopted this privacy policy ("Privacy Policy") to explain what information may be collected on our Website, how we use this information, and under what circumstances we may disclose the information to third parties. This Privacy Policy applies only to information we collect through the Website and does not apply to our collection of information from other sources.

This Privacy Policy, together with the Terms and conditions posted on our Website, set forth the general rules and policies governing your use of our Website. Depending on your activities when visiting our Website, you may be required to agree to additional terms and conditions.

Website Visitors

Like most website operators, Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours collects non-personally-identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours's purpose in collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours's visitors use its website. From time to time, Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours may release non-personally-identifying information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.

Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours also collects potentially personally-identifying information like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for logged in users and for users leaving comments on https://guidedrockarttours.com/ blog posts. Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours only discloses logged in user and commenter IP addresses under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally-identifying information as described below.

Gathering of Personally-Identifying Information

Certain visitors to Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours's websites choose to interact with Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours in ways that require Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours to gather personally-identifying information. The amount and type of information that Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours gathers depends on the nature of the interaction. For example, we ask visitors who sign up for a blog at https://guidedrockarttours.com/ to provide a username and email address.

Security

The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Links To External Sites

Our Service may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy and terms and conditions of every site you visit.

We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites, products or services.

Aggregated Statistics

Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its website. Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours may display this information publicly or provide it to others. However, Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours does not disclose your personally-identifying information.

Privacy Policy Changes

Although most changes are likely to be minor, Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and in Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours's sole discretion. Canyon Pintato and Dragon Rock Art Tours encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy. Your continued use of this site after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.

Credit & Contact Information

This privacy policy was created at termsandconditionstemplate.com. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via email or phone.

Disclaimer

All or part of this operation is conducted on Public Lands under special permit from the U.S. Bureau of Land Management.
